task.name: CATEGORISE
task.title: Categorise
task.description: Apply categories to a list of columns. Each field must have a modifier, including the first (e.g. +A -B +C). '-' modifier indicates presence/absence of values as true/false for a specific term. '+' modifier indicates that the unique terms in the field must be matched to the unique terms defined in the schema. This is a two-step process, first requiring listing the columns effected, then applying the terms.
